title: Project
description: A software project that resides on a forge (Gitea, GitLab, etc.).

name.description: Name of the project, relative to the owner.

owner.description: Owner of the project, either a forge user or an organization.

is_private.description: True if the visibility of the project is not public.

is_mirror.description: True if it is a mirror of a project residing on another forge.

description.description: Long, multiline, description of the project.

clone_url.description: URL to clone the git repository of the project.

original_url.description: URL of the homepage of the project.

default_branch.description: Name of the default branch in the git repository.
